rooms.description: A spacious lobby with Art Deco finishes and elegant fixtures. It also serves as a transitional space to the garden.
Open living area with high ceilings, geometric Art Deco patterns, and integrated multimedia systems. Features large windows for natural light.
A dedicated dining space that overlooks the garden.
Luxurious master bedroom with Vastu-aligned placement ensuring positive energy. It includes walk-in closets and a private balcony.
Additional guest room designed with Art Deco aesthetics and functional layout.
Compact yet comfortable living space for domestic help, featuring basic amenities while maintaining privacy.

openings.details: Reinforced door with Art Deco styling, integrated security system.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows with decorative grills.
Elegant staircase leading to the upper levels, ensuring Vastu flow and safety.
